resources.string:
For Single Line Comments : 
Press » Ctrl + /
 

For Multiple Line Comments : 
Press » Ctrl + Shift + /
 

For Closing tag :
Press » /
 

For View Group Closing Tag :
Press » >
 

For Change all Variable Name at a time :
Press » Shift + F6 + F6
 

For Create Constructor :
Press » Shift + Shift
 

For Search anything :
Press » Shift + Shift

ul.li: Android is a mobile operating system developed by Google, based on the Linux kernel.\n\n
Used for Smartphone, Tablet, Computers, TV.\n\n
Initially developed by Android Inc., Which Google bought in 2005 Android was unveiled in 2007.\n\n
Android is the nick name of Andy Rubin given by coworkers.\n\n
In 2008, HTC launched the first android mobile.

resources.string:
1. Phone call service.
2. Message Service.
3. Screen Capture.
4. Multiple Language Support.
5. Multitasking.
6. Support wireless communications Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, 3G, 4G.

string.name: androidRequiredSoftwareText
string.span:
i. JDK- Java Development Kit.
 ii. Android Studio Manager.
 iii. SDK.
 iv. Netbeans / Eclipse (Optional).
